name: Unauthorized Access to Systems
description: Potential for unauthorized users gaining access to critical systems

name: Data Loss or Corruption
description: Loss or corruption of critical business data due to system failures or human error

name: Service Availability Disruption
description: Extended unavailability of critical services impacting business operations

name: Regulatory Non-Compliance
description: Failure to meet regulatory requirements resulting in penalties or sanctions

name: Vendor Service Failure
description: Third-party vendor service disruption affecting business continuity

name: Insider Threat
description: Malicious or negligent actions by internal staff causing harm to organization

name: Network Security Breach
description: Compromise of network infrastructure leading to unauthorized access

name: Application Vulnerability
description: Exploitation of application vulnerabilities leading to data exposure

name: Budget Overrun
description: Project or operational costs exceeding approved budgets

name: Inadequate Change Management
description: Poorly managed changes causing system instability or service disruption

name: Phishing and Social Engineering
description: Successful phishing attacks leading to credential compromise

name: Insufficient Backup and Recovery
description: Inability to restore systems or data following an incident

name: Supply Chain Compromise
description: Compromise through supplier or partner security weaknesses

name: Identity Theft and Fraud
description: Theft or misuse of user identities for fraudulent purposes

name: Physical Security Breach
description: Unauthorized physical access to facilities or equipment

name: Cloud Service Provider Failure
description: Disruption or compromise of cloud-based services

name: Inadequate Incident Response
description: Delayed or ineffective response to security incidents

name: Malware and Ransomware
description: Malware infection including ransomware affecting systems or data

name: Data Privacy Violation
description: Unauthorized disclosure or processing of personal data

name: Weak Access Controls
description: Insufficient access control mechanisms allowing unauthorized access

name: Inadequate Security Monitoring
description: Lack of effective security monitoring leading to undetected threats

name: Third-Party Data Breach
description: Data breach at third-party service provider affecting organization data

name: Insufficient Encryption
description: Weak or missing encryption leading to data exposure

name: Configuration Management Failure
description: Poor configuration management leading to security weaknesses

name: Inadequate Business Continuity Planning
description: Insufficient business continuity planning causing extended outages

name: Market Share Loss
description: Declining market position due to competitive pressures

name: Technology Obsolescence
description: Use of outdated technology limiting business capabilities

name: Project Delivery Failure
description: Failure to deliver projects on time or within budget

name: Insufficient Training and Awareness
description: Lack of security awareness leading to human errors

name: Compliance Audit Finding
description: Audit findings indicating non-compliance with standards or regulations
